mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tweet_forward (tweet_id, user_id) SELECT #{tweetId}, #{userId} FROM DUAL WHERE (NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM tweet_forward WHERE (tweet_id = #{tweetId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0)) AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM tweet WHERE id = #{tweetId} AND is_deleted = 0))
mapper.update: UPDATE tweet_forward SET is_deleted = 1, updated = NOW() WHERE tweet_id = #{tweetId} AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY updated DESC LIMIT 1
